glosses: for no apparent reason, without provocation, out of the blue

examples.translation: The appliances at home break down for no apparent reason.

examples.text: Ve bir gün, durup dururken her şey değişti.
examples.translation: And one day, just like that, everything changed.

etymology: Compound of dur- (“to stop, to stand still”) + -up + dur- + -ur + -ken, literally “while standing still continuously”.
